H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H476.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ammihud<SDBH:עַמִּיהוּד>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► chief; ancestor of {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H4410.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H8227.def: = Syrian Rock Hyrax; animal with small round ears, no visible tail, and short legs, lives on leaves and herbs; two of their front teeth develop into small tusks; can run up almost vertical rock faces and climb trees with ease; ◄ procavia capensis syriaca; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with small size and wisdom

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1548.def: = action by which humans cut the hair on all or part of their body

H2206.def: = a growth of hair on the chin and lower cheeks of a mature man’s face, ≈ the absence of which is regarded as shameful

H7167.def: = causative action by which humans or animals rip apart the human body or an inanimate object, either in part of entirely; usually with their hands

H899.def: = piece of cloth used to cover an object

H1413.def: = causative action by which humans inflict wounds on their body with a knife, ► as a sign of mourning, or in order to reinforce one's prayer

H7927.def: = the upper part of the human body between the head and the chest; ≈ associated with heavy burdens, and, in a more figurative way, heave responsibilities

H7887.def: = man, possibly to be identified with {L:Shelah<SDBH:שֵׁלָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}׃ ► regarded as father of inhabitants of {L:Shiloh<SDBH:שִׁילֹה>}

H8111.def: = town; ◄ constructed by king {L:Omri<SDBH:עָמְרִי>}; ► capital of northern {L:Israelite<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} kingdom until it was conquered by {L:Assyrians<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}; ≈ often used metonymically to refer to the entire northern kingdom

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H3828.def: = yellow or reddish gum produced by the Boswellia tree, a shrub that reaches 3 m high, with multiple trunks and small greenish or white flowers; the gum comes out in drops from the branches; ◄ Boswellia sacra; ► ingredient of the incense burned in the tabernacle

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

50.gl: to hold, carry, have (in one's luggage)

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H4709.def: = town, also known as {L:Mizpeh<SDBH:מִצְפֶּה>}; ◄ in {L:Gilead<SDBH:גִּלְעָד>}; ► location where {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Laban<SDBH:לָבָן>} built a monument after their reconciliation; also residence of {L:Jephthah<SDBH:יִפְתָּח>}

H7122.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H6298.def: = process by which humans, animals, or deities come upon other humans or animals while travelling from one location to another, either or not expectedly; these encounters may be peaceful or result in aggression depending on the nature or intentions of one or both parties

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4301.def: = objects of value that are usually kept invisible from others to keep them safe

H2406.def: = cereal plant bearing dense four-sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin

H8184.def: = a type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; it produces a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; ◄ Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; ► its grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H1706.def: = sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility

H2308.def: = process by which objects stop existing in this world

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H2945.def: = children dependent on their mothers for care{N:001}; ≈ in this sense usually occurring in a variant of the expression  טַף וְנָשִׁים "children and women", often with possessives, indicating their belonging to families headed by an adult male; ≈ associated with vulnerability and lack of strength

H5631.def: = a male who has been castrated and made to serve in the women's quarters in the royal palace

H1391.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► one of the four {L:Hivite<SDBH:חִוִּי>} cities that made a covenant with {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H1628.def: = location ◄ near {L:Bethlehem<SDBH:בֵּית לֶחֶם>}, ► where the {L:Judeans<SDBH:יְהוּדִי>} who were on their way to {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} broke their journey, during the time of {L:Jeremiah<SDBH:יִרְמְיָה>}

H3644.def: = fire; ≈ associated with God's punishment, which is too heavy for humans to bear

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H681.def: relational indicating a location in the direct vicinity of the point of reference

H1035.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► ancestral town of King {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H3778.def: exact meaning unknown; = class of persons skilled in magic and soothsaying; ◄ found in {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>}

H3372.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H296.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shaphan<SDBH:שָׁפָן>}; ► official; time of king {L:Josiah<SDBH:יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ>}; father of {L:Gedaliah<SDBH:גְּדַלְיָהוּ>}, governor of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, time of exile

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
